description: Wondering how to cook asparagus? Learn how with this easy side dish recipe. Perfectly cooked and topped with a zesty almond crumb, it's sure to be a hit.
name: Asparagus with Lemon & Almond Crumb Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 tbs oil in a medium frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook garlic and chilli, stirring occasionally, for 2 minutes or until fragrant. Reduce heat to low. Add breadcrumbs and cook, stirring occasionally, for 3 minutes or until starting to brown. Remove from heat and stir in almonds, zest and parsley.
Bring a medium saucepan of water to the boil over high heat. Add asparagus and cook for 1 minute or until just tender and bright green. Drain.
Meanwhile, combine juice, mustard and remaining oil in a small bowl. Arrange asparagus on serving platter. Drizzle with dressing and sprinkle over breadcrumb mixture. Serve.
